items.sentence: Tom said he knew that it was Mary who did that.
Not many children around here know how to swim.
We went to the pool near Tom's house yesterday.
I've heard a report that you're leaving Boston.
Tom rang to say he was just about to come over.
Tom only has faint memories of his grandfather.
Tom can't do the report without more direction.
I love to walk along the river in the mornings.
I don't want to know what you think about this.
Tom is going to the movies with his girlfriend.
